summary: The 'Providing Veterans Essential Medications Act' (H.R. 1970) aims to amend Title 38 of the United States Code. It directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to either reimburse State homes for the cost of, or furnish, certain costly medications to veterans in nursing homes.  The bill defines 'costly medication' and 'covered State home,' and provides the criteria for reimbursement or provision of the drugs. The bill focuses on addressing medication costs within the veteran healthcare system.
